languages.text: "Угроза главе династии — не шутка, уважаемый... уважаемый". {n}Абеляр кладет руку на оружие.{/n}
"Threatening the head of the dynasty is a grave offence, esteemed... whoever you are." {n}Abelard places a hand on his weapon.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Угроза главе династии — не шутка, уважаемый... уважаемый". {n}Абеляр кладет руку на оружие.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Threatening the head of the dynasty is a grave offence, esteemed... whoever you are." {n}Abelard places a hand on his weapon.{/n}

languages.text: "Das Oberhaupt der Dynastie zu bedrohen, ist ein schweres Vergehen, geschätzter ... wer immer Ihr seid." {n}Abelard legt eine Hand auf seine Waffe.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Threatening the head of the dynasty is a grave offence, esteemed... whoever you are." {n}Abelard places a hand on his weapon.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Das Oberhaupt der Dynastie zu bedrohen, ist ein schweres Vergehen, geschätzter ... wer immer Ihr seid." {n}Abelard legt eine Hand auf seine Waffe.{/n}

languages.text: « Il n'est jamais recommandé de menacer {mf|le dirigeant|la dirigeante} de la dynastie, honorable... qui que vous soyez, » {n}déclare Abélard en posant une main sur son arme.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Threatening the head of the dynasty is a grave offence, esteemed... whoever you are." {n}Abelard places a hand on his weapon.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Il n'est jamais recommandé de menacer {mf|le dirigeant|la dirigeante} de la dynastie, honorable... qui que vous soyez, » {n}déclare Abélard en posant une main sur son arme.{/n}

languages.text: “威胁王朝首领是极其严重的罪行，尊敬的……随便你是谁都好。”{n}阿贝拉德将手搭在了武器上。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Threatening the head of the dynasty is a grave offence, esteemed... whoever you are." {n}Abelard places a hand on his weapon.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “威胁王朝首领是极其严重的罪行，尊敬的……随便你是谁都好。”{n}阿贝拉德将手搭在了武器上。{/n}

languages.text: 「王朝の頭首への脅迫は、重大な侮辱行為…それが誰かは知らんが」{n}アベラルドは武器に手をかける。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Threatening the head of the dynasty is a grave offence, esteemed... whoever you are." {n}Abelard places a hand on his weapon.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「王朝の頭首への脅迫は、重大な侮辱行為…それが誰かは知らんが」{n}アベラルドは武器に手をかける。{/n}

languages.text: «Amenazar {mf|al heredero|a la heredera} de una dinastía es un grave delito... quienquiera que seas». {n}Abelard posa una mano sobre su arma.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Threatening the head of the dynasty is a grave offence, esteemed... whoever you are." {n}Abelard places a hand on his weapon.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Amenazar {mf|al heredero|a la heredera} de una dinastía es un grave delito... quienquiera que seas». {n}Abelard posa una mano sobre su arma.{/n}

languages.text: "Hanedanlığın başını tehdit etmek ağır bir suçtur saygıdeğer... Her kimsen artık." {n}Abelard, elini silahının üstüne koyuyor.{/n}
